mapper.insert: insert into club (name, introduce, description, picturePath, maxPeople, isprivate, isadmission, lno, concern) values (#{name}, #{introduce}, #{description}, #{picturePath}, #{maxPeople}, #{isprivate}, #{isadmission}, #{lno}, #{concern})
mapper.update: update club set name=#{name}, description=#{description}, introduce=#{introduce}, picturePath=#{picturePath}, maxPeople=#{maxPeople}, isprivate=#{isprivate}, isadmission=#{isadmission}, lno=#{lno}, concern=#{concern} where cno = #{cno}
mapper.select: select cno, name, description, introduce, picturePath, maxPeople, isprivate, isadmission, lno, concern from club
